server.dbLogic

Class FuelDBLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.dbLogic.FuelDBLogic

  • public class FuelDBLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible on send querys to the DB and get/insert/update/delete Data from the data base and send it back to the server controller with the answer about the request that has been sent.
    Version:
    Final
    Author:
    Barak

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkIfInventoryOrderAlreadyCreatedForNewOrders(java.lang.String stationID, java.lang.String fuelType)
      check if there's an order that already created for some fuel type and station ID. we use this to check it in the function up above we don't want to create multiple orders for the same fuel type so this function help us to prevent this situation
      boolean checkIfNeedToCreateInventoryOrder(java.lang.String stationID, java.lang.String fuelType)
      this function check if we need to create new inventory order if the current fuel amount is smaller than threshold , we have to create an order it gets the station ID and the fuel type we have to check
      void createInventoryOrderByFuelTypeAndStationID(java.lang.String stationID, java.lang.String fuelType)
      this function create new inventory order and insert it to the the table in the DB it send an order for specific fuel type and specific station ID the amount of the fuel calculate by MAX FUEL AMOUNT - CURRENT FUEL AMOUNT
      float getAvailableAmountOfFuelByTypeAndStationID(java.lang.String fuelType, java.lang.String stationID)
      this function get the fuel type, and the station ID number and bring from the DB the current amount of fuel available.

      this function get all of the current discount requests from the DB and insert it into an Json Array.

      this functon go to the DB and get from the table all of the Company names we work with.

      • getFuelInventoryByUserName

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray getFuelInventoryByUserName(java.lang.String userName)
        this function will get from the DB the fuel types inventory by the user name of the station manager and will insert every fuel type inventory status and details into an array, and then returns it.
        Parameters:
        userName - - the user name of the client in the system
        Returns:
        array - Json array of the fuel inventory

      • getFuelTypes

        This function get all of the fuel types in the DB and insert them into JsonArray, and then returns it.
        Returns:
        JsonArray fuelTypes

      • getFuelObjectByType

        public Fuel getFuelObjectByType(java.lang.String fuelType)
        this function get a Fuel Type name than go to the DB and gets from the Fuel table the data of the fuel type, like current price and max price. then it insert it into Fuel object and returns it.
        Parameters:
        fuelType - name
        Returns:
        fuel object

        newRate - - String value of new rate.

      • updateFuel

        public void updateFuel(Fuel fuel,
                       java.lang.String newPrice)
        this function gets fuel object and a new price and then update the new price in the DB by the fuel type.
        Parameters:
        fuel - (exact fuel object of some type)
        newPrice - - the new price that we want to update

      • SendRateRequest

        public void SendRateRequest(DeterminingRateRequests request,
                            java.lang.String newPrice)
        this function get a request to determine rate of the fuel type price and the new price to be updated. then it insert to the DB in the "determining_rate_requests" table the most updated rate request.
        Parameters:
        request - - a request that contains the fuel type, current price, status and create time
        newPrice - - new price to be updated as a new rate request.

      • SendSubscribeRequest

        public void SendSubscribeRequest(DeterminingRateRequests request,
                                 java.lang.Float newDiscount)
        this function get a request to determine rate of the Subscribe type discount and the new discount to be updated. then it insert to the DB in the "discounts_requests" table the most updated rate request.
        Parameters:
        request - - a request that contains the subscribe type, current discount, status and create time
        newDiscount - - new discount to be updated as a new rate request.

      • getFuelCompanyNames

        public static com.google.gson.JsonArray getFuelCompanyNames()
        this functon go to the DB and get from the table all of the Company names we work with. it insert it into an Json array and returns it
        Returns:
        JsonArray CompanyNames - all of the Companies in the DB

      • getRateRequests

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray getRateRequests()
        this function get all of the current rate requests from the DB and insert it into an Json Array. it gets only the requests that their current status is waiting to approve.
        Returns:
        rateRequests - JsonArray of the current waiting to approve requests.

      • getDiscountRequests

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray getDiscountRequests()
        this function get all of the current discount requests from the DB and insert it into an Json Array. it gets only the requests that their current status is waiting to approve.
        Returns:
        rateRequests - JsonArray of the current waiting to approve requests.

      • UpdateDecline

        public void UpdateDecline(java.lang.String decline,
                          boolean decision,
                          java.lang.String ID)
        this function update the decision about the rate request if it gets declined. the function will insert the reason of decline and the new status by its decision for the specific request ID.
        Parameters:
        decline - - the string of the reason to decline the request.
        decision - - boolean variable, true for approve, or false for decline.
        ID - - the specific request ID.

      • UpdateDiscountDecline

        public void UpdateDiscountDecline(java.lang.String decline,
                                  boolean decision,
                                  java.lang.String ID)
        this function update the decision about the rate request if it gets declined. the function will insert the reason of decline and the new status by its decision for the specific request ID.
        Parameters:
        decline - - the string of the reason to decline the request.
        decision - - boolean variable, true for approve, or false for decline.
        ID - - the specific request ID.

      • getStationIDbyManagerID

        public java.lang.String getStationIDbyManagerID(java.lang.String managerID)
        this function gets the manager ID and go to the DB and find the station ID by the manager id that is logged in. it returns the station ID number.
        Parameters:
        managerID - - the number of ID of the manager logged in
        Returns:
        Station ID - the station ID number in string form.

      • getFuelInventoryPerStation

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray getFuelInventoryPerStation(java.lang.String stationID)
        this function get the fuel inventory of specific station. it gets the station ID and then return a JsonArray that contains fuel type, current fuel amount, threshold and Max fuel amount.
        Parameters:
        stationID - - specific Station id number
        Returns:
        fuelInventories - JsonArray the contains the data of the inventory

      • getFuelInventoryByStationIDAndFuelType

        public com.google.gson.JsonObject getFuelInventoryByStationIDAndFuelType(java.lang.String stationID,
                                                                         java.lang.String fuelType)
        this function get the fuel inventory of specific fuel type and station ID number and return specific JsonObject of specific fuel type in station.
        Parameters:
        stationID - - the specific statiod id number
        fuelType - - specific fuel type
        Returns:
        JsonObject inventory - current inventory of specific fuel type in the station given.

      • updateFuelInventory

        public void updateFuelInventory(java.lang.String threshold,
                                java.lang.String maxAmount,
                                java.lang.String fuelType,
                                java.lang.String userName)
        This function update in the DB the new threshold and/or max amount of the fuel type in the station inventory of the station manager logged in
        Parameters:
        threshold - - the threshold of specific fuel type inventory
        maxAmount - - the max amount of fuel type in the inventory
        fuelType - - the specific fuel type we want to change its inventory
        userName - - the user name of the user logged in, so we can find his/her ID and then the station ID by the query

        public float getAvailableAmountOfFuelByTypeAndStationID(java.lang.String fuelType,
                                                        java.lang.String stationID)
        this function get the fuel type, and the station ID number and bring from the DB the current amount of fuel available.
        Parameters:
        fuelType - - specific fuel type to search
        stationID - - specific ID number of station
        Returns:
        the float number that represent the amount available

                                                         java.lang.String stationID,
                                                         float amount)

        fuelType - - the specific fuel type
        stationID - - the specific station ID
        amount - - the amount we want to update

        stationID - - the specific station ID
        fuelType - - the specific fuel type
        Returns:
        boolean variable true - to create, false to not create

      • checkIfInventoryOrderAlreadyCreatedForNewOrders

        public boolean checkIfInventoryOrderAlreadyCreatedForNewOrders(java.lang.String stationID,
                                                               java.lang.String fuelType)
        check if there's an order that already created for some fuel type and station ID. we use this to check it in the function up above we don't want to create multiple orders for the same fuel type so this function help us to prevent this situation
        Parameters:
        stationID - - the specific station ID number
        fuelType - - the specific fuel type we want to check
        Returns:
        - boolean variable that tell us the answer
